name: vscode-micromamba-envs
description: Discovers, displays, and sets your micromamba environments.

micromamba-envs.micromambaBinary.description: Path or name of the micromamba executable. If empty, tries to detect it via shell.

micromamba-envs.rootPrefix.description: The Micromamba root prefix. If empty, tries to detect MAMBA_ROOT_PREFIX via shell.

micromamba-envs.environmentsTxtPath.description: Custom path to environments.txt. If empty, defaults to ~/.conda/environments.txt.
